job_description: Software engineers design, develop, and maintain software systems by applying engineering principles and best practices. They analyze user needs, requirements, and constraints to develop high-quality software solutions that meet business goals and end-user expectations. Software engineers use programming languages, tools, and frameworks to create scalable, reliable, and maintainable software products
job_responsibility: The main responsibility of a Software Engineer is to design, develop, and maintain software systems that meet user requirements and business needs while adhering to best practices and industry standards.

job_description: Software Developers design and create software solutions by writing code and testing it to ensure the product meets client needs.
job_responsibility: The primary responsibility of a Software Developer is to develop and maintain software programs and applications by writing code, debugging errors, and implementing changes as needed

job_description: Full Stack Developers work on both the front-end and back-end of web applications, developing software that is functional and user-friendly.
job_responsibility: The main responsibility of a Full Stack Developer is to develop, maintain, and improve web applications, ensuring that they are scalable, responsive, and secure while meeting user requirements.

job_description: Front-End Developers design and develop the user interface of web applications, ensuring that they are visually appealing, user-friendly, and functional.
job_responsibility: The primary responsibility of a Front-End Developer is to create and maintain the look and feel of web applications by writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

job_description: Back-End Developers design and develop the server-side of web applications, ensuring that they are scalable, efficient, and secure.
job_responsibility: The main responsibility of a Back-End Developer is to create and maintain the server-side components of web applications, including databases, APIs, and other backend logic, and ensuring that they work smoothly with the front-end.

Software engineers use programming languages, tools, and frameworks to create scalable, reliable, and maintainable software products
